input.sentences: i took a bunch of cheese .
i put them all in a baking tray .
and poured milk over it all and baked it . it was delicious .
output.sentences: Pam thought that using "Pam" in her baking was kind of funny.
After spraying the baking dish, she shredded the cheese.
Then came the tedious task of chopping up the ham.
The dish looked so professional after layering all the ingredients, she decided to take a photo.
Carefully she finished the dish by pouring the egg mixture carefully over everything and it was ready for the oven.
